title: Blood Donors Day Celebration
description: Join us in celebrating World Blood Donor Day on 14 June! Show your gratitude to voluntary blood donors. Be part of this noble cause and donate blood from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM in California, USA.

title: Blood Donor Appreciation Day
description: Express gratitude to blood donors on 20 July in New York, USA. Celebrate their generosity and commitment from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM, positively impacting the health of our community.

title: World Blood Donor Day Event
description: Celebrate World Blood Donor Day on 25 September in London, UK. Express gratitude to unsung heroes donating blood voluntarily from 11:00 AM to 4:00 PM, ensuring a stable blood supply.

title: Honoring Blood Donors
description: Honoring heroes saving lives on 5 November in Sydney, Australia. Express deep appreciation to voluntary blood donors from 12:00 PM to 5:00 PM, contributing to a healthier community.
